The dress looked almost exactly like the picture - the black band under the bust is much narrower in real life - and the fabric was not shiny or fake looking.  The material is rather cheap and like a costume, but is not see-thru and was very pretty. The black material for the neckline and halter straps was especially nice. After reading everyone else's warning about the zippers, I just stepped into mine and pulled it up and over my chest.  However - this material has NO GIVE whatsoever. Size carefully and I would size based on your bust size, as the stretch panel in the back does little to help this. I am a bigger girl (145 lbs, G-cup) so I had to buy a 3-X and just deal with the slightly larger waist. I began with a 1-X, but that was a joke.  It is long and came to my knee, and was very flattering. Yes, it is slightly cheaply made, but it is also a great value for how cute it is. I would buy it again.

Do you need a cute, flattering, casual dress for a warm environment but hate going to the store to shop for dresses? Then this might be for you. Fit: better than expected. It has a nice, natural flair. However, there isn't much stretch so size up if you're between sizes. Ease of use: it's a dress. I was successfully able to put it on and take it off without damaging myself, the dress, or anyone/anything around me. Color (I got the blue with white polka dots): just like in the picture, as expected. Comfort: it provided enough comfort and support to make me feel good about myself. I like that in a dress.

I got two of this dress in different prints, and the sizing is uniform. I would say the sizing is…well, the fabric has zero stretch, so they couldn’t make it super form fitting without risking that it wouldnt fit the average size whatever. So for me it is really loose around certain parts (like my rib cage) and fits loose for ease of movement in other parts, but nowhere is it tight. You need to have a little room in zero stretch fabric, I mean what if zombies, so that’s a good thing. Anyway, cute, for sure.

评论概述: Definitely size up!!!  Love the dress!!!
评论详情: I got so many compliments!!!! I usual wear an XL in the majority of my ordering online. I have DDs and I definitely have a fat belly 😭🤣. But I know when ordering things online sometimes u have to size up. The dress does have a little bit a stretch in the back, and I did not know that. But even though I size up and the dress had some stretch it still fit perfectly!!! I feel like if I would’ve went with a XL instead of a 2X it would’ve been tight even with that little bit of stretch. I may have fit, but it would NOT have been comfortable to wear to a theme park all day long!!! As you can see, the color is perfect!!! The dress was so comfortable, and I got so many compliments!! I would definitely order this dress again!!! Last thing I would say is, give yourself time for the shipping. It took about two weeks. So definitely do not order if you need it in a day or two!!

评论概述: Medium is huge, Materials are cheap
评论详情: The design is cute, but this is absolutely not a $40 dress. The materials used are some of the cheapest available, and the construction is too simple for this to be any kind of specialty build. The sizing was WAY off. I ordered a Medium and the waist was 4” larger than listed, and the chest was absurdly huge, literally flapping around. I would order the Small to see if it’s any better, but it’s even more expensive than the Medium was. What sense does that make????  Extremely disappointing.
